name: aliexpress.solution.seller.category.tree.query
description: API for seller to query the category tree. Support only displaying the categories which seller have permissions to publish products.

requestParams.name: category_id
requestParams.description: parent category ID. To obtain the root categories, setting the category_id = 0

requestParams.name: filter_no_permission
requestParams.description: filter the categories which seller does not have permission

subParams.name: is_leaf_category
subParams.description: whether the category is leaf or not

subParams.name: level
subParams.description: level of the categories. As for root categories, the level is 1

subParams.name: multi_language_names
subParams.description: multi langauge names of the categories
